name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xomila: Discover the Web's Hidden Gems

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Chrome extension randomly visits beautifully curated websites, exposing you to the internet's hidden wonders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uncover the internet’s hidden wonders with Xomila, our innovative Chrome extension that takes you on a journey through beautifully curated websites. Randomly visiting an array of unique and captivating sites, Xomila exposes you to the web’s best-kept secrets, sparking inspiration and expanding your digital horizons. Dive into a world of discovery and let Xomila guide you to places you never knew existed, one click at a time.
